summary: The Elder Pride Protection Act of 2025 (H.R. 3811) aims to combat elder abuse specifically targeting LGBTQI+ individuals. It mandates the Attorney General to establish the "Elder LGBTQI+ Defense and Enhance Resources (ELDER) Task Force." This task force will study the issue, develop best practices for prevention and response, create and distribute educational materials, and coordinate law enforcement efforts at local, state, and federal levels. A report on the task force's progress will be submitted to the House and Senate Judiciary Committees.
